website_summaries.verdict: One of the best value body harness straps to consider when you need something more ergonomically designed.
pros: Narrow straps offer enough support for large objects without cutting into the skin or body
Strap design frees up the arms and hands for better support or to carry other items
cons: Straps are too thin to lift anything large and awkward safely without extra straps or assistance

customer_reviews.title: me and my wife moved everything and these straps did an amazing job for not breaking our backs
customer_reviews.text: I got to say, I built a new house and had to move all the stuff from the old home, next door, besides the piano, which I had professionals move it, me and my wife moved everything and these straps did an amazing job for not breaking our backs, especially my wife's; she insisted on not hiring professional movers when she realized how easy is moving stuff with these straps. I really loved them, especially that for few dollars I saved a lot of money by not hiring someone else to do the job, now mind you, I moved 5 bedroom sets, double china sets, stove, washer/dryer, fridge, couches, etc, so this was no small job.
customer_reviews.author: D/P

customer_reviews.title: good balance and a strong back
customer_reviews.text: Be careful lifting anything heavy. Straps are thin, making the balancing of anything substantial -- washer, dryer, heavy trunks, etc ... -- difficult, but not impossible. Need strong legs, good balance and a strong back. Videos of elderly folks and soccer moms lifting dryers may be accurate if they are just lifting the thing up and down, but if they are walking, good luck. If they need to climb steps, forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected. Sorry !
customer_reviews.text: I moved this week end and I bought this item with the aim to avoid backpain and get something to help me with big furnitures. My point of view is that the item is not good as expected. Loss at the arms level. Hard to put in. No stability, we had to secure every time furniture to be sure that it was not falling down. I had a big expectation and at the end I am disappointed. Sorry to say that.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fructus

customer_reviews.title: works poorly compared to other moving straps. Size can't be adjusted. Meant for giants.
customer_reviews.text: The straps that go across the chest and back can't be adjusted, and the default setting isn't even for a standard person. You'd need to be well over 6' tall and at least 400 lbs to fit this thing, and if you aren't the part where the metal bars attach to the center strap are just going to hang awkwardly around your groin area and tug down hard on the straps making carrying these very uncomfortable. I have used moving straps before and they worked great. These were not it.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: it you're bigger than 6' 220 lbs I would recommend first of all losing some weight like I still ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bigger guy, 6' 220 lbs, but my friend who is helping me move is bigger. This item says "One size fits all", but there is no way it's going to fit his fat butt! Just saying, it you're bigger than 6' 220 lbs I would recommend first of all losing some weight like I still need to and also looking at another product. The product is very well built and much stronger than expecting. Note: it fit him and we both agreed this is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit for shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write negative reviews, but these were so bad that I have to.I bought these with the intention of being able to easily move furniture and mattresses, as several friends have been moving lately. They only for over 2 of 7 people's shoulders. I'm 6'4", 220lbs and these barely fit on me. They are not size adjustive at all. Once I did find someone who it fit, the strap wasn't long enough for the king mattress. I just gave up and grabbed a blanket. The one good thing is that if you are like 5' high and 100lbs, the material is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Helps Marginally
customer_reviews.text: Great concept in theory; however, in practice most things are not easy to moves with these. After reading about these I was expecting to be able to easily move bed frames, sofas etc with these. Quickly found out that it still requires a lot of strength to use these simply to balance the furniture. As such, these are marginally helpful but definitely not as easy to use as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: Non-adjustable Vests
customer_reviews.text: this means the buckle rides low, so that any small object such as a pot is not workable. They show a ridiculously large pot because it needs to be that big in order to steady it. Moving large pots such as what you'd find at the big home development stores (which is what most people have) is impossible because you can't stablize it. All they needed to do was to make the vests adjustable so that the pots could be lifted higher.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Just the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Remodeling required moving all the bedroom & living room furniture; however, hiring help proved difficult & securing volunteer help was almost impossible. With the straps a 14 year-old & his grandma moved large pieces of furniture easily. Since then a young woman used them to move into her first apartment. Another couple used them to move bedroom furniture. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R Time

customer_reviews.title: Magical; great for large appliances
customer_reviews.text: This worked like magic. I was skeptical when I first initially bought this, but just today, my husband and I were able to lift a very heavy old dryer on our own with no problems (this dryer was from the 80s, so it was extra heavy). Kind of nice because now we can move anything on our own schedule without having to worry about calling anyone to help. For reference, I'm 5'4 and 135 lbs, and my husband is 6 ft and 200 lbs. Also, we didn't have to go up or down any stairs. BUT it was amazing -- almost felt too easy. I'm completely sold on this, and we'll be using these straps all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Wright

customer_reviews.title: Incredible--turns you into the hulk.
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I had to move a 500 lb piece of granite countertop down the 2nd floor stairs. We didn't feel comfortable doing it on our own, so I ordered these and it made moving it "almost" a piece of cake. Didn't even break a sweat! My only word of caution is that the body harness may not fit those with larger circumferences. I wear size 38 pants and have a 50" chest. It was a little snug getting the harness over my body. The top part is fine, it's the body straps that were a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: A back saver!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and had a friend helping me move all my furniture for a remodel. These absolutely saved me. So stupidly simple but ingenious! Moved out without them, and almost killed myself. Bought them to move back in and the difference was astounding at how much easier it was to lift and maneuver large heavy furniture. I may never use them again, and they're already worth every penny I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowing
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I had carry a dresser up two flights of stairs when moving into our apartment. It took us a while, but we did it. I was 110 lb at the time and she was less that 140 lb. The furniture is still heavy, but much much easier than doing it with your bare hands.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Useful, fast delivery UPDATED REVIEW: July 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of awkward to strap up but figured it out and they did help while moving furniture.UPDATED REVIEW: July 2020. My son-in-law and I moved a full size stack up washer dryer through a doorway across uneven terrain to a different building. The clearance on the doorways was a couple of inches but we navigated easily considering how heavy it was and the fact that I am over 70. We could not have done without this awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Geat product I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Worked great I just wish the straps around you body was adjustable.it hung a little low. I'm not sure if that's how its supposed to fit but either way it worked. I was able to lift 1 washer a dryer and 2 large reclining couches up 17 flight of stairs with only 2 people with little to no struggle. I just wish the straps around your body was adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Xavior P

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got these straps to move a foosball table to my upstairs game room and they worked great. The only thing you should be aware of is you must get down really low to get the item you are moving up high enough to clear stairs. I also suggest practicing with a few lightweight items before you attempt to move something heavy up a staircase.
customer_reviews.author: CNA

customer_reviews.title: however this item is so awesome that I feel like I need to let everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews on the items I buy from Amazon, however this item is so awesome that I feel like I need to let everyone know. If you are looking for moving straps to carry heavy items in the house, rather it’s on stairs or what not, these moving straps you are the ones should get! I’m 5 ft tall, husband is 5’8 and we moved 2 sets of washers and dryers up and down our L shape stairs with no problem! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wondering about them before I bought them but figured I would try them. Being 60 I don’t quite have the strength I once had. I recently moved and couldn’t believe the ease of moving my “heavy” solid wood furniture. It was like I was in my 20’s again. Wonder if they make anything to work on the rest of me?...lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These are great!! Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Guys were so not interested in trying & I convinced them to just try it & they were all saying that had to get a set of these. They are great & we’ve moved so much that we otherwise would not be able too. Even myself & young son. These are great & you just can’t beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat F

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and useful gadget
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and useful gadget! I saw one on TV that straps around the front of your elbows and thought that was neat, then I saw these and bought these instead since it allows the use of your hands still! worth the buy, if you are going to be moving heavy things. I bought these when I moved into my new place but still find a use for it once in awhile while remodeling or redecorating. one star off because I always confuse myself which way the straps go on. Then again, that's probably just me. Then again, I don't like to blame myself too often. Still a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: J.Gallant

customer_reviews.title: back save dont have to be the hulk to move things
customer_reviews.text: thought my wife was crazy when she got these. it made moving so easy. we even where able to pick up a 6 foot by 10 feet metal shed that is install on a pressure treated 2x4 base with no issue. washer and dry felt like moving feathers with these. don't think about them just get a set if you have any heavy or large items to move!!
customer_reviews.author: Irgunr

customer_reviews.title: Needed if your moving anything heavy
customer_reviews.text: Moved a 650 lb safe with myself and a friend. If I were to complain about anything it would be that the harness is too small for both users. But it definitely got the job done with ease
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Furst

customer_reviews.title: You got to get this thing if you move!
customer_reviews.text: If you are planing to move furniture with a friend, then you better take this pieces because it really really helped me on our moving process! I really recommend it to you!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving heavy/bulky object a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to move my daughter from a two story apartment (it was just the two of us). She scolded me for wasting the money, continuing that she didn't want to be seen wearing them. It did not take her long to change her mind let me tell you. These straps saved us! There is no possible way we could have moved all her furniture without it. Now every time we need to move something she wants to know where the straps are.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny L. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Steep learning curve for moving
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this for moving, but it was too hard to get adjusted correctly and my partners all bailed on me. We had to move down stairs and there was just no way it was going to happen reasonably quickly given the learning curve. I think it's better for moving furniture around a room but it's not going to get the use that I'd hoped for. I would probably suggest marking the strap for common item sizes and their ranges
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Good straps
customer_reviews.text: These lifting straps work well. The buckle system is smart once you figure out how it works, and the quality and craftsmanship seem to be top notch. No complaints and it's better than my previous system which didn't cross the shoulder straps. Cross design is much better because it prevents slippage. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you're a large man...
customer_reviews.text: They fit great if you're a large man, I'm a 5'1" 140 lb female and my daughter is a 5'7" and 125 lb. They kept sliding off our shoulders and didn't allow for any adjustments based on the size of the person wearing them. It was a waste of money for us...
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Made our move so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Recently used these to move between apartments. We moved a large HEAVY dresser, bulky TV stand, and leather couch with absolute ease. Instructions are simple and clear, the construction seems sturdy, and the strap is long enough to work with just about anything. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The straps need padding where they cut into your neck ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps need padding where they cut into your neck. Wrap with a small hand towel to prevent the discomfort. Be sure to measure the item you are lifting and buy separately the 15 ft strap if you need it. The cheesy short strap is too short for long couches.
customer_reviews.author: CA Central Coaster

customer_reviews.title: Works well for large items, smaller non-square items not so much
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my wife, who is several inches shorter than me. Either I was uncomfortable or she was depending on where the pivot point was under the item. It is especially hard to use for small, heavy items as there just isn't enough support. We gave up after about 45 minutes or trying to use this. It was easier to just carry the items. I would suggest this though for large, bulky items. It greatly helped moving couches, large furniture, and anything else with a square or rectangle shape.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Must have for moving!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this with our 15 yr old son to move couch, recliner, and washing mashine/dryer. Also used this with my 13 yr old daughter to move some bookcases. This is awesome! Totally makes lifting a piece of cake! Easy to use, strap was big enough to accommodate everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great item for moving.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little too tight at times as I am a large person, but it sure made moving (armoire, beds, dressers) a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: must buy if you need to move large items.
customer_reviews.text: bought this product after watching Sears deliver my stove seamlessly using back straps. I was amazed how easily they went up the stairs, around corners and positioned it perfectly. after owning a pair of arm moving straps I can say THANK YOU. no strain on back, arms!
customer_reviews.author: Rogwilco7

customer_reviews.title: Back saver.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny even if you only use them once. We had 3 large pieces of furniture to move. We used the straps and although it took us a little time and we did have to stop and rest, we still got the furniture moved without injuring ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Juls B

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must-have for moving!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical, but decided to give this product a try after scheduling a long distance move. We put it to use right out of the box and were very happy with the results. The strap and suspenders put all the load on our shoulders and legs, allowing us to just use our hands to balance the furniture and heavy boxes. It's even good for carrying loads up and down stairs, albeit with some adjusting of the strap length between the two movers. Overall, a quality product and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Makes it “easier” to move, NOT “easy” to move
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it easier to move but there is struggle to it. It will bruise ur shoulders if your moving heavier items. And the release isnt easy you have to go on your knees and manually pull the strap back out of the locking loop. I had the intentions it would make moving easy but i was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, good lifts
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for team lifting and taking your arm strength out of the equation. The "one size fits all" is a bit of a stretch.. if you wear a 2x shirt you're going to be feeling squeezed when wearing the harness. The straps are much thinner and the lifting strap shorter than the brand name Shoulder Dolly, but this works well as a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M

customer_reviews.title: Chest Straps Aren't Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: We ended up needing to return ours because the chest straps aren't adjustable. I would guess they would work for men up to size 1-2XL but probably not much beyond that size. We didn't end up using them, but they looked like they were good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing harness
customer_reviews.text: Only came with one harness. By the time I opened it when we were going to move- it was passed the return date. Shouldn't have purchased it- as I read other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Toni-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Safety first .
customer_reviews.text: If you move you need this . im 5.2" 105 pounds my husband is 5.5" 160 pounds and i've helped move heavy items that with out this thing would have been imposible.among them a dryer and heavy furniture this makes it easier and safer when going down the stairs. I would 100% recomend this item .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slides off often
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a malfunctioned one, but my set doesn't like to stay tight after carrying stuff around for a few minutes. It's strange, I followed instructions clearly and now it's too late to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: I needed to lift something heavy and wide and move it down a hill and across a good distance, so I got two sets of these ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work, and with a single set of lifters, it would not have gone well. I needed to lift something heavy and wide and move it down a hill and across a good distance, so I got two sets of these and four people. With two straps for balance it was a breeze and I am sure I will use these again for other heavy items!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: She-Ra Maker
customer_reviews.text: Makes moving SO much easier. Where has this been all of my life? Made it possible for my sister and I (two women) to move my fridge, washer, stove, dryer, couch, armoir, and everything with much greater ease. It's more narrow than expected, so larger users have to improvise. A larger friend had to wear it upside down to make it fit and tie a knot to make the strap stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: QBG

customer_reviews.title: Saves your muscles and back
customer_reviews.text: Used these a couple of times to help friends move. I wish I had these when I had to move. They are very simple looking and very easy to use. Makes lifting couches and dressers much easier. We are never sore the next day after using these.
customer_reviews.author: pokedbz1691

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! My sister and a male coworker used them to haul a couch out and around the house and up a hill! He was surprised how easy it made lifting and this is a big dude! My sister handled it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: PamFabulous

customer_reviews.title: This made moving much easier. My 69 yr, ...
customer_reviews.text: This made moving much easier. My 69 yr, old mother was able to help move a bedroom set without problems.This product lets you open doors and go up stairs while handling bulky items.Save your back, get this item.
customer_reviews.author: McGyverRob

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, these are the ones you need.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these type moving straps. These are by far the best I've ever had. The over the shoulder design allows you to easily move very heavy items without being exhausted. These really are a great value for the price. Get these if you are moving and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Will E.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing was too much trouble for these straps.
customer_reviews.text: These allowed my wife and I to move our entire home's possessions without the need to bring in outside help. Large box springs, standup deep freeze, 60" television. Nothing was too much trouble for these straps. The hardest part was getting the heavier items up and down stairs but that would have been completely impossible without them.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Computer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Strap only works for picking up a particular shape of object. Total junk. Instructions are terribly written. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Karns

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Made moving big ideas easier. Even my teenagers were moving furniture with them with ease. Kind of hard to put harness on if you have a belly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: hard to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and used it one time. U spend more time trying to put it on than using it! I am going to the forearm forklift system and selling these! Dont like it at all!
customer_reviews.author: GZEUSJ

customer_reviews.title: I like them. I used them to move all the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little strange to get the hang of, but overall, I like them. I used them to move all the heavy stuff in the house and it worked out great. My buddy and I moved a standup piano, large buffet table, China cabinet, and huge storage container. All these items were extremely heavy and without these straps, it would have been almost impossible to move with two guys.
customer_reviews.author: Name not needed....

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy appliance/ furniture movers
customer_reviews.text: New fridge was orginally installed in extremely tight quarters and needed to be moved out from the wall a few inches. Fridge was impossible to get a hold of..so we bought these straps , used a dolly and 3 strong men, and finally fridge moved out from wall and we were able to open doors all the way.
customer_reviews.author: GraniDani

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: These straps are amazing. I have some very large pieces of furniture. The guys helping me move were thrilled to have these. They stated they were going to order some themselves to have for their own moves. You won't be disappointed in these straps.
customer_reviews.author: brwneyedgirl04

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone moving heavy or large objects!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone moving heavy or large objects, these are awesome! My wife and I can move most anything, inside or outside, large or heavy, and still have a hand or two free for doors or tight spaces. Much better than the wrist straps.
customer_reviews.author: hummvee69

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If you move big equipment, this is needed! No instruction so don't hurt yourself
customer_reviews.author: Sarath T. Sok

customer_reviews.title: A must have for heavy furniture moving
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped for large heavy furniture. Highly recommended for all ages. Elders and young
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: needs addition strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea in theory but with only one strap at the bottom of something heavy like a washing machine...it just doesn't work. Ever try to balance a washer on a tightrope? That is pretty much what you are doing. It is very unstable. If there were two straps at the bottom it may work. Live and learn...but research wisely before purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great "Hump Strap" kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great "Hump Strap" kit. Very simple to use with everything you need to move extremely heavy furniture and appliances safely. Not a toy. This is very well made, durable and efficient kit. Try it, you'll love.
customer_reviews.author: yep_its_good

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues and used these to move heavy couches and other furniture and it helped tremendously. I wouldn’t haven’t have been able to move the things I did without this gadget. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: These straps are way to big for a short person and you cannot adjust them small enough to even stay on your shoulders. So far we have only tried to use it once.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Best moving purchase
customer_reviews.text: These straps made moving so much easier. Moving is a pain in the rear normally but this product made it much more tolerable. I wish I had these for all the other times I've moved.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy lifting!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked wonderfully for moving. I do wish the straps would tighten when you put them on different body types but once you start lifting that didn’t matter as much. Definitely recommend for anyone doing heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ognissanti

customer_reviews.title: ... not exaggerating when I say that this is the best purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exaggerating when I say that this is the best purchase I have ever made. These straps have made numerous moving days an absolute breeze. I have lent these out to many friends/family over the past year. A great investment for anyone who plans on moving, or college-aged, or newlyweds. These will always be in my toolbox. Always.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Brawner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever invented! I have used these to move several large/heavy or odd shaped items in very tight spots, and they are the best purchase I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: CMS995

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: It really helped when we had to move the washer and dryer from the upstairs! It not as "easy and light" as the people in the ad makes it seem, realistically it's less smiling and more sweating but it does help a lot and it's easy to "set up".
customer_reviews.author: InVinoVeritas

customer_reviews.title: Makes lifting and carrying easy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to assist in a recent move and have to say that they worked out better than expected. Lifting a heavy couch or chair was a breeze, especially down longer hallways. The one thing to consider is the size. The harness goes over your head and over your stomach. I am 5'10 and around 190 lbs. If I was much bigger I think it may have been a problem getting the harness on. With that being said I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: VERY handy rig to move things.
customer_reviews.text: VERY handy rig to move things. I half wish I stepped up to the more expensive one, but this is good enough for me for now. I found it a little challenging to get the end of the middle strap through the buckles after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the GREATEST idea ever!! My fiancé & I moved our entire 3 bedroom house ourselves using these straps. We didn’t have to remove anything from the dressers we could just easily lift them & go! I would highly recommend these to anyone who plans on moving.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us, we had a bath tub ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for us, we had a bath tub that needed moved up to our second level. We tried many different configurations with the straps so we could lift it up the stairs, but it would not work
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: They'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I'm knocking one star, because products like the Forearm Forklift are much easier to use. It is nice having your hands free to hold doors open etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all day long!! If you have ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all day long!! If you have ever moved anything or plan to in the future, buy these things!! My wife and I moved our entire house with just the two of us using these! They are a must and do exactly what they say!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A must own item...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this type of strap existed until I saw the delivery guys for my new washer wear something similar. This makes moving large/bulky items like a washer SO MUCH easier. Holly S balls. Just buy it. If you can get a version of this with a wider strap, then get that one instead. Remember that the red part should be on top and X centered on back.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Made for an easier move!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and makes for a much easier move out of a home and into a new one. I would recommend to anyone I know who could use the assistance moving furniture. Thanks so much for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow do these things make moving a breeze. ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow do these things make moving a breeze. These little miracle workers allowed me and a friend to move a stand alone freezer up three flights of stairs will no problems at all. If you don’t have these when you move, you’re crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not my thing
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your time ,tried to use it several times, buckles slip ,takes to long to adjust ,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was missing the second harness, didn't make sense. Maybe only comes with one harness?
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder harness is not adjustable. I am 6'5" tall and could barely get any this on over my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Okrim Navalg

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the forearm forklift straps
customer_reviews.text: I wont lift anything heavy or bulky again without using these!! Way better than the forearm forklift straps. I recently moved a chest freezer that was full of food from one house to another using these! NO problems, no sweat! Also moved a large gun safe upstairs to the second floor. Doubt I could have without these babies.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth nichols

customer_reviews.title: Keep your friends.  These will let two people move almost anything in the house!
customer_reviews.text: My wife (5'5'') and I handled our entire house move thanks to these saviors of vertebrae. Full length couch? easy. Huge armoire with legs too long for a dolly? Done. For $20 bucks, do your self a favor if you're moving and get these. Also, I highly recommend the Forearm Forklift straps which allow you to handle nearly as much weight, but are more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Neely

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, but it not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used it for our move and found it painful when using it. However, it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Avrohom & Chaya Chayempour

customer_reviews.title: it's very difficult to mount with. uses a clumsy ...
customer_reviews.text: it's very difficult to mount with. uses a clumsy buckling system, you have to crouch down to buckle it after snaking the strip underneath whatever you're lifting. After lifting, it's difficult to keep the item balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Proffer

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Did not use them, sent them back. When moving up and down stairs they just don't really make sense. Maybe if you were moving something heavy on completely flat ground...
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: great except for on staircases with tall and short people using it
customer_reviews.text: work great unless you are tall and the other person is short and you have to go up stairs. A couple steps is ok, but going up 2 flights almost killed me. I was the tall one and on the bottom end.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but don't adjust
customer_reviews.text: They work great as advertised. Material is solid and they are a must when moving heavy items. I just wished the body straps were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: It help
customer_reviews.text: Used once and it helps a lot! But It won’t fit for everything .
customer_reviews.author: S & C

customer_reviews.title: Strap not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got one of those fake ones? The strap is not 3" wide. I should have just got one locally.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyNC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: The brackets slip very easily and not easy to maneuver with heavy items. Had a close call taking things on stairs. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Claire

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a life saver! I bought it just to move a very heavy, very old cabinet and it made it SO much easier. We moved it once and vowed to never move it again. Now its not so bad!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use straps can be a little difficult to get on at first.
customer_reviews.author: c snow

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought these and skipped the cost of professional ...
customer_reviews.text: We moved a huge new fridge up a large set of outdoor concrete steps with no trouble. Still heavy but totally doable. Then later used these for a washer and dryer set. Glad we bought these and skipped the cost of professional appliance movers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Archer

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This is a definite recommend buy for sure. I will be buying a second pair for sure. Made moving stuff a lot easier. On a side note it will destroy your legs but better then destroying your arms. If you're looking at these, just hit the buy button now, you wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These actually did work. Not that hard to manage, I was expecting more of a hassle. But they did help with heavy lifting and moving.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: These straps work perfectly. I even cheated once and used them by myself. Though I would not advise anyone to do that, it made the job practically effortless. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Teufelshund63

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for moving!
customer_reviews.text: These moving straps are a LIFE saver. You can move big, heavy furniture around safely. Even with stairs! My only negative is the instructions are a little difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Greene

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Used once and may not again for awhile so there is that. Worked once anyway
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice Asset if you want to save your back.
customer_reviews.text: Great for moving huge pieces of furniture but beware of going up and down stairs as there is no adjustment for that variable. But carrying dressers on a level surface it was an excellent help in my move.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Save your back for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We used these to move our laundry machines down stairs. Our son, age 16, and my husband were super please how easy they were to use, and how manageable the job was with the aid of these straps. We used them again the next weekend to move an antique chest of drawers upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Wife approved
customer_reviews.text: Because of this product, my short, weak wife was able to help me move a large frig
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving
customer_reviews.text: With really heavy loads it has slipped slowly. The strap is slick like nylon so even when run through the latching mechanism correctly, it can slide. I think if they used a metal bar that wasnt so smooth or had a little texturing to it, it would stay in place better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Ready Lifter Shoulder Moving Straps for Furniture, Appliances, Heavy or bulky Easy to Adjust for Carrying and Lifting Heavy Objects up to 600 LB and 12' long
product_meta.description:
The Ready Lifter Lifting Aid is the ideal moving and lifting system for the apartment renter or lightweight user. With a recommended carrying weight of 600 lbs., it is the perfect system for helping out with furniture and appliances around the house or apartment. This product was specifically designed for homeowners and renters in residential use. 

Manufactured by Nielsen Products, makers of the Shoulder Dolly, the Ready Lifter was created for the homeowner, apartment renter, college student, or anyone who wants to move that big bulky item from one place to another. Easy for any 2 people to utilize together with adjustable straps. Lifts objects up to 10-Feet long and 600 lbs heavy. The kit includes two polypropylene harnesses and one 12-Feet long x 3-Inch wide polypropylene lifting strap. Looking for higher weight-carrying capability and increased comfort while moving? Look for Nielsen Products' Shoulder Dolly and Shoulder Dolly Pro Lift.
feature_bullets: MOVING STRAPS LIFTING AID - The Ready Lifter recognized the need for your arms to be unconstrained. The need for stabilization, opening doors, and overall balance is all attained with the Ready Lifter. Allows for temporary use of one free hand.
SAFELY LIFT AND MOVE - Ergonomically designed to promote and facilitate proper lifting techniques.
REDUCE BACK PAIN - Back pain and strain is avoided by ensuring proper lifting techniques and utilizing the body's strongest muscles, the legs and torso.
INCREDIBLE VERSATILITY - Due to the seemingly unlimited adjustability of the strap through the buckle, users can move and lift heavy, bulky furniture easier than ever.
ONE SIZE FITS ALL - Differences in the height of movers are overcome due to the adjustability of the webbing through the buckle.
